specifications: Scree: 7.0-inch Resolution: 480 x 234 pixels Picture Format: JPEG/BMP/GIF/TIFF/PNG Music Format: MP3/WMA/OGG Video Format: MPEG1/MPEG2/AVI/DIVX Audio Output: stereo, 1W x 2(8ohm) Memory: 16Mb NOR FLASH Power Supply: 110V-240V input, 9V/1.5A or 12V/1A output Storage Method: 2.0 USB HOST/SD/MMC/MS Display Mode: manual / auto Electricity Saving Mode: can set automatic shutdown System Support: Win2000/XP/Vista Port: USB2.0 Net Weight: 1.14kg Size: 255 x 205 x 110mm
